CustomField.description: If you wish to create a staging record if this field setting record has a specific value, then this value is the value we are going to compare the field setting record value against.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If you wish to create a staging record if this field setting record has a specific value, then this value is the value we are going to compare the field setting record value against.
CustomField.label: Create Staging Record Condition Value
